reviews.review: This game can be buggy as frick but its fun, I think, why are my ears bleeding?
Very cool concept that has been executed well!

I cant recommend this game if you are going to play it semi serious and if you plan to play the killer. Killers get walked over in the higher rank and all you can do is watch them Teabag for you at the exit and cry after each match. There is nothing you can do to prevent half the stuff the survivors come in with. Might as well give them a gun and get it over with so they can just kill the killer and win the match for good.

Edit - This game suffers from a massive toxic community of survivors. They are OP and they know it so they do stuff like T bag in front of you when you cant catch up because they know you wont catch up to them. When the exit gates are open a survivor should be running for it like its death or life currently they choose to stay inside and torment the killer a little more. This game can be great but sadly most survivors are toxic players and on top of that as mentioned above they are plain and simple just over powered.
Solo si odias tu vida y estas dispuesto a destruirla llenandola de toxicidad, adelante, compralo.
tbh i just think its fun

Pour les sans amis je conseille le gameplay tueur, pour les groupes de potes le mode survivant en amis est g√©nial. Les meilleurs moments que vous passerez seront surement en partie personnalis√©e avec l'un de vos amis jouant le tueur dans le mode Tuez vos Amis. Am chelit jucanduma jocul asta. Daca vreti sa omorati pe cineva de nervi , jucativa cu el jocul asta
it easy a fun and simple game good for lockdown
Pretty good game I enjoyed a lot even tho the matchmaking is not balance

i really like this game, one of my faves. if you like survival as much as i do, you will like this game as well. the only disadvantage is some killers - the ones that are camping, tunelling etc. it really annoys as surv main:p there are good ones out there too tho
jogo bom jogo bom jogo bom jogo bom

üëé No I hate this game but cant stop playing it help
Excelente juego para jugar con amigos y pasar el rato.
This game Is really fun but the survivors are kind of weak. I would like to enjoy survivors like before.
MTO BOM NOSSA SENHORA, S√ì ESSES HIT ROUBADOS QUE PEGAM H√Å 3 METROS DE DISTANCIA, MAS UM BOM JOGO
Nice game good for streaming and still now great one to play with friends mind relaxing

Game play can be fun when it works, community is toxic af tho. Entitled players feel you should play the game they way they feel you should play and have a melt down most of the time they lose. Every time they release new content for the game it breaks simple game mechanics, next update to come out literally breaks the same things again. Developers do not product test content patches before release even tho they have a public test server. The devs have also ignored the hit box issues that sometimes make the game unplayable as survivor for years and have yet to effectively address the issue still. Chat filter is laughable, a sorry attempt to appease a cry baby player base who takes a game too seriously.
Get the gens, AND GET OUT!

It's hard to find unique co-op games to play with your friends that aren't FPS or MOBAs. This is really good for that. Would definitely recommend for people wanting to play with friends. Queue times take forever sometimes because of lack of killers, but it's worth waiting for up to a certain point.
The hit boxes are broken, the servers are bad, and alot of the characters are ugly.
Es un muy buen juego, sobretodo si tienes amigos con quien jugar
el juego se me hizo muy repetitivo, sin contar el hecho de que es pay to win. Me he cansado de marear a los asesinos exclamando escrupi escrupi rumba fiumba
Good game, worst community there ever was in the online world.
Muy divertido para jugar con amigos!

Such a fun game where you can just stalk the survivors as your favorite killer, but also super fun trying to survive from your favorite killers. It is definitely much more fun with a group, but its nice to just queue as a killer and wrek these noobs. 10/10 would stare as Michael Myers again.
its a ton of fun to play with other players and the multiplayer aspect is great even when you have a bad team the only time im not having fun is when im getting stomped on by a good hunter
Have played for years amazing game

Creo que es un juego muy bueno de un formato √∫nico no visto hasta ahora; muy divertido y bien balanceado que se puede disfrutar tanto jugando solo como Killer de manera individual o como de Survi en modo multijugador on line en partidas abiertas o con amigos. Se podr√≠a decir que los Survis si est√°n bien organizados tienen una cierta ventaja sobre el Killer pero la comunicaci√≥n entre ellos y los roles que toman cada uno es fundamental. El sistema de rangos diferencia la calidad de jugadores y la extensa variedad de habilidades lo hacen un juego muy completo y competitivo. Como todos los meses estos rangos se reinician se complica al inicio de este, ya que se mezclan los jugadores expertos junto a los novatos. Y la verdad que lo mas importante es que encuentra una partida muy r√°pida para ser un juego on line que necesita 5 jugadores en l√≠nea para funcionar, cosas que suelen complicarse en los juegos que no son Free To Play
